text: puok del kmean chomnue nung thngai barlok som aoy vea kaetlaeng phleam . rie banda anak mean chomnue vinh ku puokke meankar phyokhlach champoh vea haey puokke doeng tha vea nung kaetlaeng yeang pitabrakd . chaur doeng tha pitabrakd nasa puok del chhlohbrakek knea champoh kar kaetlaeng nei thngai barlok nih ku pitchea sthetnow knong pheap v nge vng da sen chhngay
